name: css-transition-properties
description: Css module of single purpose classes for transition properties

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-transition-properties.css > css/css-transition-properties.css && tachyons src/css-transition-properties.css --minify > css/css-transition-properties.min.css && tachyons src/css-transition-properties.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
